footer.sponsor-posts: Check out info from our sponsors

homepage.quote-title: Received the latest news about Covid-19
homepage.quote-description: CTracker, the most reliable and fastest source for you to catch up information about Coronavirus
homepage.ad-1: We will bring you live data about the Coronavirus worldwide
homepage.ad-2: We have seen no stop to the Coronavirus due to the lack of information. Our aim is to let our users have the latest info for them to catch up and help preventing the situation from getting worse
homepage.ad-3: Precise data was gathered from WHO, ECDC and CDC
homepage.ad-4: You can assured that the data you are seeing on this page is:

ad-5.list-4: Completely free and always will be

homepage.ad-6: The total numbers of infected people around the world are updated daily
homepage.ad-7: Using tables like these, users can get a summary view of the current situation world wide
